title: Eve forces passive play;
body:
And collects her free Pink ward gold.

And there's nothing you can do about it.

replies.body:
HOW ARE YOU GOLD!?

you have a really bad mantality considering your rank
{{champion:35}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:107}} all these champions can bypass wards and burst you for 3x as much

Comparing an early game champion to a late game defense is simply stupid. Unless eve is so terrible that she feeds constantly before level 10, she is one of the strongest flanker and punisher in the entire game. She forces opponents to spend more gold on pink wards, play extremely passively and conscious of pushing due to the possible flank. Her Q is on a very short cooldown and at early levels shreds the opponent's health. She is easily able to do more than 500 dmg with Q and AA alternation at level 3. However, late game is another matter. She falls behind due to defense, wards, grouping and hard CC. That being said, don't underestimate her. With {{item:3135}} and {{item:3151}} her damage is still quite high.

If you're the enemy top laner or Jungler you'd best pick {{champion:107}} Or {{champion:421}}. Counter everything she does. 
{{item:3362}}
If Eve doesn't gank a lot then she isn't making optimum use of his/her time. Having said this, you should know where she is judging by when and where she last appeared. 

She's not that oppressive.

But apart from her stealth, she is a really weak champion. Not incredibly tanky and doesn't do ridiculous amounts of damage. Doesn't have self buffs or ally buffs, doesn't have an insane amount of CC and has terrible clears. Stealth Ward her camps so you know whereabouts she is, try and work with your jungler to gank her while she's jungling. And try to always keep track of her whereabouts!

heh.. heh. heheheh.... insta kills squishy while still having 1k hp and about 200/200 armor/mr... heh not that weak, only early clear and ganks are weak, but that's fixed with good runes and masteries

Show me proof that an Eve **instakill** a squishy with 200 armor and mr and we'll talk.

By the way 1k is like.... nothing lmao.
lol mb didn't mean to say 1k meant about 3.7k, and about 200 (which can range from about 20 in either direction)
